snippet: Mr. Fri, who nearly doubled attendance at the Smithsonian Institution’s National Museum of Natural History during his tenure, also served in posts at the Environmental Protection Agency.
abstract: Robert W Fri, an influential energy adviser who held pivotal positions in both government policy making and private enterprise, and who served for five years as director of the Smithsonian Institution’s National Museum of Natural History, dies at age 78.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Fri, who nearly doubled attendance at the Smithsonian Institution’s National Museum of Natural History during his tenure, also served in posts at the Environmental Protection Agency.

headline.main: Robert W. Fri, Energy Adviser and Director at Smithsonian, Dies at 78
headline.print_headline: Robert W. Fri, 78, Who Drew Visitors to Smithsonian

keywords.value: Smithsonian National Museum of Natural History
keywords.name: organizations
